caseNameFull: Melvin Eugene FLETCHER, Appellant v. the STATE of Texas, Appellee

opinions.snippet:
OPINION
 

  J. Brett Busby, Justice
 

  Appellant. Melvin Eugene Fletcher was charged with felony theft of metal after a police officer witnessed him taking copper from a business. At a hearing before trial, appellant waived his right to counsel. He was subsequently convicted and sentenced to seven years in prison. Appellant raises two issues on appeal.
